授業目的: The purpose of this course is to prepare Japanese students to work successfully in the diverse environments of global companies.
到達目標:
Through thus course students will gain an understanding of:
1. Key management and leadership principles for success in international business
2. The complexities of managing a business across cultures and countries
授業方法:
対面授業。ただし、新型コロナウイルスの感染状況等により、Zoomによる同時双方向型オンライン授業に変更する可能性あり。授業は日本語で行いますが、期末レポートは英語での提出をお願いいたします。
"Face-to-Face" Format at Umeda Campus for all the sessions. However if any of the sessions need to be changed to Online format due to COVID restrictions, I will give everyone an update accordingly. The course will include lectures, group discussions and student presentations. Please note final examination reports need to be prepared in English.

第11回: Case Study: Japanese and Western Companies
トピック.授業外学習2: Reading 6 case studies and preparation for 1 student group presentation.
